I dont usually write comments on any site I am a member of as I get so much pleasure reading the pathetic and ignorant comments from the majority of the ones posting comments, but in this case I have to.  
1. Incest is illegal in any normal country but when between adults of consenting age, the law would have a job to prosecute.
2.  Incest is not Child porn, UNLESS it involves the act between an underaged child (m or f) with an adult.  Then it becomes ABUSE.  This should be punished in any coutry to the fullest extent.
3.  Child pornography now in most civilised countries is classed as the use of children in either a sexual manner and the taking of pictures of nude children in poses classed as being of a sensual nature.  A picture of a child playing naked on a beach in the height of summer is not CP but one filmed in the home like that can be.  
4. With regards "real incest" there are web sites operating in the USA where apparently in some states it is not illegal, with genuine adults of the same family who have sex together.  These are pay sites and the FBI and other agencies are not closing them down.
5.  When calling people who upload the torrents on this site "sick fucks" and other such wonderful names, it begs the question of WHY you are here in this section at all?  Since joining TPB instead of just downloading I only found out that Porn was a seperate section that can be ommitted from the search listings.  Therefore to get into links such as this you have to be typing in such words as incest, preteen etc.  So who really are the "sick fucks"

Now, before I recieve a barrage of abuse to which I am totally oblivious anyway, I want to make a few things perfectly clear.

1.  I am not involved in incest, never have been never will be.
2.  I enjoy sex, I enjoy looking at porn BUT only when it involves adults.
3.  I tried once to be a vigilante as some people I have read comments from on other torrents, and search out the filth of CP infesting the web, only to be warned by the relevant authorities that by reporting it I was leaving myself open to prosecution for having viewed it.
4.  I have reported sites in the past that have hosted CP pics hidden among the normal adult pics and some of these have now either cleared the stuff or closed down.
5. Finally as I have ranted on enough now, IF any sort of porn or sex offends you, then remove the Porn section from your search, its in the options on your membership page, dont put search words in that will bring up any references to sex, and most importantly GET A FUCKING LIFE!!!
